# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.TSC property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Time Stamp Counter. A value of true indicates the RDTSC instruction is supported.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: TSC
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey TSC { get; }
```
